name: Lovu Lovu Medicine
description:
Heyho, you funky sexy Lovu Lovu Doctor!

Foxy lady Fio has a foxy fever... A special kind of fever only your Lovu Lovu can cure! ;)

This game was made for Jonas Tyroller's *Wowie Jam 2.0*.
